info.title: Al-Noon API
info.description: Backend API for Al-Noon dashboard and storefront

bearerAuth.description: JWT from sign-in (cookie `al_noon_token` or Authorization: Bearer <token>)

ProductData.description: Product document (list item or single product)

averageRating.description: Present on list when ratings exist

TopSellingItem.description: Top selling item (productId, name, image, totalQty)

home.description: Flat object: storeName, logo, quickLinks, socialLinks, newArrivals, homeCollections, hero, heroEnabled, newArrivalsLimit, homeCollectionsDisplayLimit, feedbackSectionEnabled, feedbackDisplayLimit, feedbacks, announcementBar, promoBanner, section images/videos

MessageDataResponse.description: Success with message and optional data

AuthResponse.description: Auth success with token and user

PaginatedProductsResponse.description: Full response body returned by list products: success, data (array), pagination. Optional message may be present.

ProductResponse.description: Full response body returned by get/create/update/delete/status/stock: success, optional message, data.product (single product).

RelatedProductsResponse.description: Full response body returned by related products: success, data (array of products).

InventoryListResponse.description: Full response: products with low or zero stock (data.products + optional data.threshold)

suggestedQuestions.description: Suggested questions for the chat widget

AiProductCard.description: Product card shown in chat (id, name, image, productUrl)

AiChatData.description: AI chat reply payload (sessionId, response text, optional product cards)

sessionId.description: Session ID to continue the conversation

productCards.description: Product cards to display with this reply (if any)

AiChatMessage.description: Single message in a chat session

productCards.description: Present only on assistant messages when products are suggested

AiSettingsResponse.description: Full response: AI settings (enabled, greeting, suggested questions)

AiChatResponse.description: Full response: AI chat reply and sessionId

AiSessionsResponse.description: Full response: paginated AI sessions list

AiSessionDetailResponse.description: Full response: AI session with messages

get.summary: Get store + home data (store config, newArrivals, homeCollections, hero, announcementBar, promoBanner, section media, limits)

200.description: Store and home payload (data.home is flat object with all fields)

get.summary: Get footer page content by slug (privacy, return-policy, shipping-policy, about, contact)

200.description: Success; sets cookie and returns token and user

201.description: Created; sets cookie and returns token and user

200.description: Full settings object (store, hero, collections, etc.)
Email sent or skipped (if SMTP not configured)

sessionId.description: Optional; omit to start new session
